content:
Sure, I have added new buildings that will become available to construct at population milestones of 200, 300, and 500. The effects of these buildings besides population and income will not be displayed until they are unlocked.

When the population reaches 200, the following building will be unlocked:

* University (1000 funds, +50 population, +200 income, +10% increase in education level)

When the population reaches 300, the following building will be unlocked:

* Stadium (2000 funds, +75 population, +500 income, +15% increase in entertainment level)

When the population reaches 500, the following building will be unlocked:

* Airport (3000 funds, +100 population, +1000 income, +20% increase in tourism level)

As the population grows, new buildings will become available to construct.
You can now construct a building or wait for more income to increase the funds.
Please note that waiting for income will only increase the funds, and will not affect the population.
